column1: #Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " This girl may be the Avatar , but she 's no pro-bender and the Platypus Bears are intent on exploiting that weakness ! "
#Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " They 're giving her their best , and her best ai n't good enough to stop it ! "
#Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " Aaaaand she 's in the drink . "
#Text=You were to stay on the island !
#Text=I 'm kind of in the middle of something .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I have tried my very best to get through to you by being gentle and patient , but clearly the only thing you respond to is force !
#Text=So I am ordering you to come back to the temple right now !
#Text=So I can sit around and meditate about how bad I am at airbending ?
#Text=You know , I 'm beginning to think there 's a reason I have n't been able to learn it !
#Text=Because , maybe , I do n't even need it !
#Text=This is what I need to learn !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Being the Avatar is n't all about fighting , Korra !
#Text=" Korra says : " I have a match to go finish .
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " The Platypus Bears win round two !
